meanings.definition: A pungent root used as a condiment and in medicine.
meanings.sent1: I added a bit of horseradish to my sandwich for extra flavor.
meanings.sent2: The horseradish gave the sauce a spicy kick.
meanings.sent3: The horseradish made my eyes water when I took a big bite!
meanings.sent4: Her words were like horseradish, sharp and biting.
meanings.sent5: The smell of horseradish lingered in the kitchen long after cooking.

meanings.definition: A plant of the mustard family, with a thick, fleshy root.
meanings.sent1: The horseradish plant grew well in the rich soil.
meanings.sent2: Farmers harvested horseradish roots for market sale.
meanings.sent3: The horseradish plant stood out among the other vegetables with its large leaves.
meanings.sent4: The horseradish root was like a hidden treasure beneath the soil.
meanings.sent5: The horseradish plant swayed gently in the breeze, its leaves rustling softly.
